item.title: Openshift 4.x and Service Mesh - 1
item.description: Author: Thomas Jungbauer - Last Modified: 2020-03-29 20:29:40 +0200IntroductionThe following tutorials for OpenShift Service Mesh are based on the official OpenShift 4.3 documentation: OpenShift 4.3 Service Mesh. Currently OpenShift supports Istio 1.1.17, which shall be updated in one of the future releases.To learn the basics of Service Mesh, please consult the documentation as they are not repeated here.

item.title: Example Post
item.description: IntroductiontestPrerequisites22testcode with listTest with imageA thinkspot admonition.

item.title: The beginning
item.description: Example Asciidoc PostThis is an example asciidoc post.You can use a manually placed table of contents by setting :toc false in the front matter, but use :toc: macro at the top of the post, and toc::[] where the table of contents is supposed to be, like here:Section 1With some text and maybe even a bulleted list:Thing 1Thing 2Or how about some bold or italicized text?Section 2Will a code snippet work?
